ProductWarrantyTerm.name: ProductWarrantyTerm
ProductWarrantyTerm.description: Defines the relationship between a product or product family and a warranty term.

CoveredProductFamily.description: The product family that the warranty term applies to.

CoveredProductId.description: The ID of the product that the warranty term applies to.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the product warranty term was last modified.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the product warranty term was last viewed.

ProductWarrantyTermNumber.description: The identifier for this product warranty term.

WarrantyTermId.description: The ID of the associated warranty term.
